title: World Cup 2022: Gareth Southgate tight-lipped on future after France loss
description: England manager Gareth Southgate said he needs time to "reflect" when asked about his future following his side's exit from the World Cup after a 2-1 defeat to France.

title: Rita Moreno: If I wasn't Hispanic, I'd have had a different career
description: West Side Story icon Rita Moreno says discrimination left her with an unfair share of rubbish film roles.

title: Nurses' strike could be 'paused' - union chief says
description: The Royal College of Nursing is calling on the government to negotiate with nurses and avoid strikes.

title: World Cup 2022: 'Angry, gutted, devastated' - BBC MOTD pundits react to France beating England
description: BBC Sport's Jermaine Jenas and Martin Keown react to England's 2-1 defeat to France in the 2022 World Cup quarter-finals.

title: The secrets shared by Afghan women
description: Two female Afghan writers give a glimpse of how women have been coping since the fall of the regime.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag keen to replace Ronaldo in window
description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag is keen to find a replacement for Cristiano Ronaldo when the transfer window opens next month.

title: World Cup 2022: England manager Gareth Southgate to 'reflect and review' position after loss
description: England manager Gareth Southgate says he will "review and reflect" on his side's World Cup quarter-final exit with the FA before making a decision on his future.

title: World Cup 2022: France v Morocco semi-final to be broadcast live on the BBC
description: Morocco's first-ever appearance at a World Cup semi-final will be available to watch on the BBC.

title: World Cup 2022: England's Harry Kane misses chance to equalise with late penalty in France defeat
description: England are awarded a second penalty in their World Cup quarter-final against France after Theo Hernandez's elbow on Mason Mount, but Harry Kane blasts over from the spot.

title: World Cup 2022: Olivier Giroud header restores France's lead against England
description: Olivier Giroud scores a trademark header to restore France's lead against England and make it 2-1 in Doha.

title: World Cup 2022: England out of World Cup with France defeat
description: England go out of the World Cup as goals from Aurelien Tchouameni and Olivier Giroud give France a 2-1 victory and a place in the semi-finals against Morocco.

title: England: Harry Kane equals Wayne Rooney's all-time goals record
description: Harry Kane equals the England scoring record with his 53rd goal, netting in the World Cup quarter-final to move alongside Wayne Rooney.

title: World Cup 2022: Is Portugal's exit the end of the road for Cristiano Ronaldo?
description: Cristiano Ronaldo's World Cup dream is over, and probably for good - but is his whole career also reaching the end of the road?

title: Eva Kaili: Senior EU lawmaker arrested over alleged bribery by Gulf state
description: Prosecutors suspect the country tried to illegally influence European Parliament decisions using.

title: World Cup 2022: Morocco are 'Rocky' of tournament after beating Portugal
description: The marvellous Moroccans have lit up this World Cup - and their fans got reward by witnessing their side becoming the first from Africa to reach the semi-finals.

description: Holders La Rochelle begin their Heineken Champions Cup defence with a thumping 46-12 bonus-point win over Northampton Saints.

description: Rate the players as England face France in the Fifa World Cup quarter-final in Qatar.

title: Laura Kuenssberg: Putin set UK on search for new friends

title: World Cup: Fans in Morocco and around world erupt with joy
description: Supporters cheer as the North African side beats Portugal, defying expectations.

title: 'Pure Moroccan magic' - full time celebrations and tears

title: World Cup 2022: Morocco 1-0 Portugal: Youssef En-Nesyri scores winner
description: Morocco become the first African nation to reach a World Cup semi-final and end the hopes of Cristiano Ronaldo's Portugal.

title: Three killed in explosion at flats in Jersey
description: At least three people have died after an explosion at a block of flats in Jersey.

description: Youssef En-Nesyri opens the scoring for Morocco against Portugal in their World Cup quarter-final.

title: World Cup 2022: Argentina and Netherlands charged by Fifa after bad-tempered quarter-final
description: Fifa opens disciplinary proceedings against Argentina and the Netherlands after their bad-tempered 2022 World Cup quarter-final.

title: World Cup 2022: Morocco make history as they reach semi-finals
description: Youssef En-Nesyri's first-half header gives Morocco a 1-0 win over Portugal as they make history and become the first ever African side to reach the semi-finals of the World Cup.

title: Nobel Peace Prize: Russian laureate 'told to turn down award'

title: World Cup 2022: Messi the master as Argentina beat Netherlands in chaotic Qatar classic

title: Sam Bankman-Fried: I hope to make money to pay people back
description: The former FTX boss says he would give anything to start a new business and repay crypto investors.
